message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item comes with a range of advanced features and benefits that are sure to enhance your experience. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15000. I believe this represents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the features and benefits you mentioned.
